This document outlines the assignment requirements, deliverables, and master checklist for your final project.

## Core Requirements

- **Individual project**
- **6,000–8,000 words** (excluding references, tables, appendices)
- **15-20 academic, peer-reviewed citations**
- **One original survey** (N=100 goal) or pre-approved alternative
- **Two Research Questions (RQs)** and/or **Hypotheses (RHs)**
- All data analyzed in RStudio
- At least two APA-formatted data visualizations
- APA 7th Edition style, written in Quarto (`.qmd`)

## Final Deliverables

- **Blackboard:** Final rendered `research_paper.pdf`
- **GitHub:** Private repository with all project files
